title: LFT or LFP im cardboard 7, started playing a lot lately but need friends, i always GL&HF and GGWP^ ^

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Preferebly mature people
please no ragers or elo obsessions, just wanna play and hav fun xD
gg.

ps. might get into rank games at some point

replies.body:
Find someone to play with.

You'll eventually start to learn a lot  in Norms.

No, i mean you can solo and learn.

Doesn't matter if you make mistakes. 

Just learn from them.
I am in B4 but happy to do normals or ranked.  Summers name is Tetra Energy.
